shipAI

Engine

Your personal AI development companion. Build stunning UIs, full-stack apps, and websites powered by Qwen, Gemini, or DeepSeek — all automated and stunningly fast.

Auto Code Generation

Turn prompts into working Vite/Next.js projects. Pages, components, routing — all structured and downloadable.

Multi-Model Smartness

Uses DeepSeek, Qwen, and Gemini to split and generate intelligently — each with defined roles.

High-Quality UI by Default

Built-in dark theme, serif-sans typography, animated dot grid, and ultra-slick UI components.

Downloadable Codebase

Get ready-to-run codebases with working frontend and backend logic — no setup needed.

Prompt Splitting Engine

Gemini analyzes intent and splits prompts into file creations or code chunks. No hallucinations.

Flask + Vite Backend

Driven by a Python backend with file writing, structure detection, and prompt routing built in.

Ready to get started?
